title: Arcade1Up Limited-Edition Pac-Man Cabinet & New Countercade Available At Amazon

description:
A new month has arrived, which means a new slate of events to look forward to in Pokemon Go. The mobile game has a variety of activities lined up for the final month of its Max Out season, including new Spotlight Hours and a Mankey Community Day.

That's not all that's happening this month. On top of that, a handful of legendary Pokemon from the Galar region will make an encore appearance in raid battles, including Regieleki and Regidrago. Origin Forme Dialga and Palkia will also appear as raid bosses this month, giving you another chance to add these rare legendaries to your collection.

We've put together a rundown of all the biggest events happening in Pokemon Go this month below.

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Pokemon Go November 2024 Events: Raids, Spotlight Hours, Community Day, And More

description: Tons of great lore.
title: The Complete DRAGON AGE Timeline Explained!

description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 received an update today, November 1, introducing a number of changes and fixes across multiplayer and Zombies.

For multiplayer, the update fixes an issue that caused some players to see a black screen when loading into a multiplayer or Zombies match. Beyond that, Black Ops 6's multiplayer mode has removed the Lowtown map from the Infected playlist and fixed an issue in free-for-all matches that caused scoring to be based on total score, rather than elimination points, as it's meant to be.

Black Ops 6's Omni-movement system gets
title: Black Ops 6 Patch Notes For November 1 Update Detail The Latest Changes

description:
Activision has released the latest in its "Replacer" line of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 ads, and this one is maybe the best and funniest yet. If you're just catching up, Peter Stormare plays a character called The Replacer; he's the guy who replaces you because you're too busy playing Call of Duty.

In this newest spot, The Replacer fills in for Tonya on Jeopardy, before having a hilarious exchange with Jeopardy host Ken Jennings that culminates in The Replacer replacing Jennings. It's good stuff, riffing on Saturday Night Live's popular series of Jeopardy spoofs with a contestant messing with the host.

Activision has created more than two dozen of the
title: This Black Ops 6 The Replacer Video Is Maybe The Best And Funniest Yet

description: It's the 70th anniversary of Godzilla this week, and to celebrate, Super7 has revealed its new Godzilla Minus One collectible figure. This highly detailed and articulated figure is designed to be an authentic replica of the iconic monster, as it's based on the same 3D models used for the 2023 film starring the titan and approved by director Takashi Yamazaki. Priced at $85, it's now available to preorder from the Super7 website.
title: New Super7 Godzilla Minus One Collectible Toy Roars To Life

description: Arcade1Up's Infinity Game Board is rarely on sale, but Amazon is offering a modest discount right now that drops the price of the digital board game tablet to $473 (was $500). You may need to click "Other sellers on Amazon" to find the option that's shipped and sold by Amazon. Multiple third-party resellers are selling the Infinity Game Table for around $450, but these will not be shipped from Amazon, so you'd be taking a bit of a gamble.
title: Arcade1Up's Board Game Tablet Is Discounted At Amazon - Comes With Over 100 Games

description:
Another year, another chapter down--and it's just about time to say goodbye to the Chapter 5 island as we head into Fortnite Remix season. Similar to last year's OG season, Remix will take us back to an old version of the battle royale island for a month before Chapter 6 begins in December. And the Remix party will start on Friday, Nov. 1, at 6:30 PM ET/3:30 PM PT, when a new live event will usher in whatever this new season has in store.

The event, dubbed Remix Prelude, will take place during battle royale and zero build matches at Restored Reels, the ancient Greek movie theater at the center of the island. What exactly will this event involve? We really don't know, but Epic really wants you to be able to watch whatever it is without being griefed by random other players--it's making Restored Reels a "protected area" in which you can't kill other players
title: How To Take Part In The Fortnite Remix Prelude Live Event

description:
Final Fantasy XIV's patch 7.1 update, Crossroads, will launch on November 12 and it features a hefty amount of new content.

The new Crossroads main scenario quest involves the Warrior of Light and their companions as they seek help the people of two worlds move forward. The game's first raid is a crossover with Final Fantasy XI called "Echoes of Vana'diel - Jeuno: The First Walk and will allow for 24-player battle content. There's also a new dungeon called "Yuweyawata Field Station," a new trial called "The Minstel's Ballad: Sphene's Burden," and a new eight-player ultimate raid called "Futures Rewritten."

For those who fancy a challenge, Chaotic Alliance Raids will be introduced. These are harder versions of existing alliance raids. One week after the subsequent sub-patch 7.15 is released, the "Cloud of Darkness (Chaotic)" raid will launch. Unreal trials are older trials scaled up to the max level, and t
title: Here's Everything Coming In Final Fantasy XVI's 7.1 Crossroads Update Very Soon

description:
In Dragon Age: The Veilguard, there's a Mass Effect Easter egg awaiting for players to discover. It involves one of Rook's companions, Bellara.

Minor spoilers ahead for Dragon Age: The Veilguard.

Early on in the game, Bellara joins the player's group, and at one point in the story, she can found repairing the Eluvian mirror in the group's home base. If you repeatedly try to speak to her, eventually she'll say, "Sorry Rook. I'm just in the middle of some calibrations."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Has A Mass Effect Easter Egg

description:
Amazon has revealed the next batch of free PC games that'll be available through its Prime Gaming service, and in November, subscribers can look forward to 24 games in total.

As a reminder, once you claim the free games from Prime Gaming, they are yours to keep forever--even if your subscription expires. If you aren't a member, you can sign up for Amazon Prime for as little as one month to take advantage of the subscription and score some great freebies.
title: Amazon Prime Members Get These 24 Free Games In November

description:
Outfitting your PS5 with a larger NVMe SSD for more storage space is a worthwhile upgrade. Unfortunately, NVMe SSD prices are higher than they were last year due to production costs and general shortages, so it isn't always easy to justify the expense. Unless, of course, you're lucky enough to find one on sale--and that's what we're here to help with. We've waded through the Amazon listings to find the best discounts on NVMe SSDs that are compatible with PlayStation 5.

  • The best PS5 SSD deal of November 2024 (so far): Corsair MP600 Pro 1TB for $80 ($110)
  • Runner-up: Lexar 1TB NM790 f
title: Corsair's Highly Rated 1TB PS5 SSD Is Only $80 At Amazon

description:
It's been one week since Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 released with 16 brand-new multiplayer maps, but Treyarch has already added Nuketown to the game's map pool. The new update also includes a limited-time double XP event, and here we highlight everything that's included.

Nuketown is live in Black Ops 6 with the map's original 1950s-style from 2010's Black Ops 1, with the only major difference being the updated graphics. Fans of the map will likely notice everything from the map's design replicates the original. This even includes the iconic map's double rainbow in the distance.
title: Call Of Duty: Black Op 6's Nuketown Map Is Live With Double XP

description:
Apex Legends is no longer supported on Steam Deck or Linux as a result of cheating, according to EA.

"Linux is used by default on the Steam Deck," an EA community manager wrote in a post announcing the change. "There is currently no reliable way for us to differentiate a legitimate Steam Deck from a malicious cheat claiming to be a Steam Deck (via Linux)."

Apex Legends introduced Steam Deck support in March 2022, making it one of the only battle royales available to Steam Deck users. The same year, Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney said that there were no current plans to make Fortnite accessible on Steam Deck, citing
title: Apex Legends Loses Steam Deck Support Due To Cheating Concerns

description:
Flashbang grenades are meant to disorient your foes. Instead, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 players have discovered that using them to blind your teammates will net you 15 XP. It's a farming trick that promotes bad cooperation.

YouTube streamer Expel posted a video of the XP exploit on X, adding that throwing flashbang grenades at allies "gives you XP" and "do with this information what you will." The UI text on screen states, "Flashed Enemy," so it seems likely this is an unintended benefit for being a terrible teammate.
title: New Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 XP Farming Trick Turns You Into A Terrible Teammate

description:
The exact number of PlayStation 3 consoles that were ever produced has been revealed, according to a current Sony employee.

In what started as a discussion on Twitter about the PS3's infamous boomerang controller, a Sony programmer responded that they had walked past the controller in Sony's Japan headquarters recently and that it was located on the 16th floor near a coffee machine.

The employee took a picture of the boomerang controller in the display case, and on the shelf under it, there was a PS3 console marked with the words, "In memory of PS3 last production. Manufactured 88,159,116 pcs. Period: Oct 2006 - June 2016."

Continue Reading at GameSpot
title: We Finally Know How Many PS3s Were Ever Made

description:
Destiny: Rising, the mobile RPG based on Bungie's shooter series from NetEase, is kicking off its closed alpha test today, November 1. The test, which requires an invitation, runs until December 5 at 11:59 PM PT.

The alpha test is open to people in the US and Canada. If you haven't already signed up, you can do so at the Destiny: Rising website for a chance to get in. The test goes live today at 9 AM PT / 12 PM ET, so footage is likely to emerge soon.

The closed alpha includes a sampling of content from the full game, including the prologue of the main story campaign, three public events, two strike missions, and access to Gauntlet--this is a raid-like, six-player mode. The alpha also includes the game modes Morgran's Prey, The Realm of the IX, Legacy, and Shifting Gates, along with "casual activities" set between missions.
title: Destiny: Rising's Closed Alpha Test Starts Today, Includes Multiplayer And Story Content

description:
Best Buy has launched a new Buy One, Get One 50% Off Sale on hundreds of video games for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch. As the title suggests, you can pick any two games from the lists below, and when you check out, you'll get a 50% discount on the list price of a game with an equal price or cheaper in your basket. The weird thing here is that this only applies once per transaction, so if you're looking to grab 10 games and unlock five discounts for example, you'll need to make five separate purchases of two games each.

But you don't want to miss this promotion, as it includes a bunch of new releases, such as M
title: B1G1 50% Off Video Games: Metaphor: ReFantazio, Final Fantasy Pixel Remaster, Space Marine 2, And More

description:
Dragon Age: The Veilguard is BioWare's biggest launch on Steam, reaching the top spot on Steam's sales charts and knocking down Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

According to SteamDB, Dragon Age: The Veilguard has peaked at 70,414 concurrent players within the first 24 hours of its release. This beats out BioWare's previous record of 59,817 concurrent players for Mass Effect: Legendary Edition.

BioWare put extra effort into making sure the PC version of Dragon Age: The Veilguard was up to snuff on Steam. The game is verified on Steam Deck, and passes Valve's internal tests on inputs, display, performance, and seamlessness. A technical breakdown of the PC version by Digital Foundry revealed it to be an excellent port, which is of
title: Dragon Age: The Veilguard Is BioWare's Biggest Launch Ever On Steam

description:
Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl looks like visually impressive, and fittingly, it'll need a lot of hard drive space to fit in all 64km² of the Exclusion Zone. The official PC specs for the game are now live, and while it's not too demanding in terms of RAM, GPU, and CPU requirements, you will need to ensure that you have 150GB of SSD storage capacity available.

Like several other modern games, Stalker 2 lists a solid-state drive as a mandatory requirement, likely due to them having vastly superior read/write speeds when compared to traditional hard disk drives. Developer GSC Game World has previously spoken about how it has attempted to create a photorealistic version of the Chornobyl Exclusion Zone, and early previews of Stalker 2 have shown off a lush environmen
title: Stalker 2 PC Specs Require A Ton Of Storage Space But Surprisingly Modest Hardware

description:
Talk about a strong start for the Monster Hunter Wilds beta. Just hours after releasing, the early test for the action-adventure game hit over 460,000 concurrent players on Steam. Keep in mind those figures don't even account for people on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S, either.

On SteamDB, the Monster Hunters Wild beta reached a peak of 463,798 players roughly hours after it began last night at 8 PM PT / 11 PM ET on October 31. The open beta will run until 6:59 PM PT / 9:59 PM ET this Sunday, November 3. So it's possible the concurrent-player count hits an even higher number as the weekend kicks off. (At the time of publication, around 430,000 people on Steam were checking it out.) Overall,
title: Monster Hunter Wilds Beta Begins With Almost 500,000 Concurrent Players On Steam

description:
Rockstar Games is continuing to update and expand Grand Theft Auto Online, and a major new update is coming this December. The developer has announced a new robbery-themed expansion is coming to the multiplayer experience next month, focused on the Darnell Bros. Garment Factory.

The factory is under new management, now being run by Pavel and a former FIB officer. Players will help them convert the factory into a "hive for clandestine infiltration operations." From the base, players can launch into "a bevy of thrilling and strategic new robberies."
title: Major GTA Online Update Releases This December; PS5/Series X Features Come To PC In 2025

description:
Hideo Kojima has revealed Death Stranding 2: On The Beach's title screen with a tantalizing teaser, but no one should get too attached to it just yet. Kojima clarified that the title screen is "still very much temporary."

Right now, the screen features the game's name and a background image of Norman Reedus' character, Sam Porter, and a baby. The title screen has options for "Continue," "New Game," "Load Game," "Options," and "Recap of Death Stranding." That last one might be handy for anyone who needs a refresher on the events of the 2019 game, which had a narrative full of twists, turns, and Conan O'Brien.

This screen is still very much temporary.
title: Death Stranding 2's Title Screen Revealed, But There Is A Catch
